title: SetAcknowledge (Method)
text:
METHOD SetAcknowledge : BOOL
Function to directly acknowledge an alarm with additional information as an alternative to IAlarmHandler.AcknowledgeOneOfGroup.
Add a comment from a certain user or leave both fields empty if no comment is needed.

rows.Name: pwsComment
rows.Comment:
Optional: Provide additional information about the reason of
the acknowledgement.

rows: Optional: Provide a user that made the comment.
